duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage routine to complex environmental projects for industrial, municipal, and commercial clients
Provide knowledge of environmental due diligence, permitting, and regulatory compliance for air, hazardous waste, solid waste, and water
Demonstrate excellent verbal and written communication skills
Organize and manage multiple project assignments

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Science disciplines (Master's preferred)
Professional Registration (PE or PG) considered a plus
